challenge.title: Step 74
challenge.description: Modify the row_str comprehension to give a string only when the item is not zero, and an asterisk character otherwise.

tests.text: The list comprehension assigned to the row_str variable should call str() on each item i in row if i is truthy, and it should evaluate to '*' otherwise.
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
expressions = ["str(i) if i else '*'","'*' if i == 0 else str(i)","str(i) if i != 0 else '*'"]
node =_Node(_code).find_class("Board").find_function("__str__").find_for_loops()[0].find_bodies()[0].find_variable("row_str").find_comp_expr()
any(node.is_equivalent(expr) for expr in expressions)`)) })

challengeFiles.name: main
main
